name: parcel
effect: Given to the trainer’s rival in Jubilife City. Contains two Town Maps, one of which is given to the trainer upon delivery.
short_effect: Given to the trainer’s rival in Jubilife City. Contains Town Maps.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A parcel entrusted in your care. You are supposed to deliver it to your childhood friend who left Twinleaf Town.
flavor_text.platinum: A parcel entrusted in your care. You are supposed to deliver it to your childhood friend who left Twinleaf Town.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A parcel entrusted in your care. You are supposed to deliver it to your childhood friend who left Twinleaf Town.
